alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued November 23 at 2:02AM PST until November 24 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR BEACHES... * WHAT...Sneaker waves possible on the beaches. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast Counties. In Washington, South Washington Coast County. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Waves can run up significantly farther on a beach than normal, including over rocks and jetties. Sneaker waves can suddenly knock people off of their feet and quickly pull them into the frigid ocean which may lead to serious injury or drowning.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
